title: Washing the beard in Wudu | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: aasif says how to wash the beard when I'm performing would one of to either your beard is thick and you cannot see the skin and in this case washing the face once twice or thrice and then put water in your hand and just try to it with that one scoop of water get as much as possible to your beard this is what the Prophet used to do Alice for some the second were a beard or tide is when your beard is thin and you actually can see the skin underneath and it's very short and in this case washing your face would also mean that you rub your bead because the hair would be penetrated with the water Isha Allah and this would suffice
